title: raamaa srI raamaa laalee
sahitya:
rAma shrI rAma lAli

anupallavi

 Ugucu ghana shyAma nanu brOvu lAli

caraNam 1

 kAci sEvintu lAli shESa talpamu nUci pADudu lAli EkAntamuna 
dAci pUjintu lAli vELa ninnu jUcucuppongE lAli O vanamAli
   
caraNam 2

 cAla pAlintu lAli mIgaDa venna pAlu dAgintu lAli shayyapai mallepUla 
baratu lAli varamaina vIdamula nosagudu lAli O vanamAli
   
caraNam 3

 vEda vEdyamA lAli kannula jUDavE dayAnidhi lAli nAduramuna nI 
padamulanucu lAli shrI tyAgarAja modarUpamA lAli O vanamAli
